name: Chain
snippet: The chain stitch is the most basic of all crochet stitches

name: Single
snippet: Single crochet is the shortest and most basic of all stitches.

name: Double
snippet: Double crochet is another basic crochet stitch you'll need to know. Its a tall, textured stitch with many potential uses. Double crochet combines well with all of the other basic stitches, and there are unlimited ways to use it.

name: Half Double
snippet: Half double crochet stitch is taller than the single crochet, and shorter than the double crochet.

name: Slipknot
snippet: A crochet slip knot is important to master because it is the first step taken when beginning any crocheted piece.
